1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content operators on Boolean.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Logic
6  ( copsLogic
7    -- $Operators
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Coxhand  as H
13
14
15-- ----------------------
16-- $Operators
17--
18--  [@all@]      @x is all f g h@ == @f x and g x and h x@.
19--
20--  [@and@]      Logical conjunction.
21--
22--  [@any@]      @x is any f g h@ == @f x or g x or h x@.
23--
24--  [@not@]      Logical negation.
25--
26--  [@or@]       Logical disjunction.
27--
28--  [@then@]     Logical implication.
29--
30--  [@when@]     Inverse implication.
31--
32
33-- | Content operators on Boolean.
34copsLogic :: (D.CBool c, D.CEmpty c) => [D.Cop c]
35copsLogic =
36    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix    "and")     copAnd
37    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix    "or")      copOr
38    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix    "then")    copImp
39    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix    "when")    copWhen
40    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "not")     copNot
41    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "and")     copAnd
42    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "or")      copOr
43    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "then")    copImp
44    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "when")    copWhen
45
46    , D.CopCox   (D.copNormal   "all")   $ copCollect "and"
47    , D.CopCox   (D.copNormal   "any")   $ copCollect "or"
48    ]
49
50cop1 :: (D.CBool c) => (Bool -> Bool) -> D.CopCalc c
51cop1 p arg =
52    do xc <- D.getRightArg1 arg
53       x  <- D.getBool $ Right xc
54       D.putBool $ p x
55
56cop2 :: (D.CBool c) => B.Bin Bool -> D.CopCalc c
57cop2 p arg =
58    do (xc, yc) <- D.getRightArg2 arg
59       x <- D.getBool $ Right xc
60       y <- D.getBool $ Right yc
61       D.putBool $ p x y
62
63copN :: (D.CBool c) => Bool -> B.Bin Bool -> D.CopCalc c
64copN unit op = loop where
65    loop []   = D.putBool unit
66    loop [xc] = xc
67    loop (xc1 : xc2 : xs) =
68        do xc1' <- xc1
69           xc2' <- xc2
70           x1 <- D.getBool $ Right xc1'
71           x2 <- D.getBool $ Right xc2'
72           loop $ D.putBool (x1 `op` x2) : xs
73
74copNot  :: (D.CBool c) => D.CopCalc c
75copNot  = cop1 not
76
77copWhen :: (D.CBool c) => D.CopCalc c
78copWhen = cop2 $ \x y -> x || not y
79
80copImp  :: (D.CBool c) => D.CopCalc c
81copImp  = cop2 $ \x y -> not x || y
82
83copAnd  :: (D.CBool c) => D.CopCalc c
84copAnd  = copN True (&&)
85
86copOr   :: (D.CBool c) => D.CopCalc c
87copOr   = copN False (||)
88
89copCollect :: String -> D.CopCox c
90copCollect n fs = Right $ H.f1 $ H.ib (D.copInfix n) (map fill fs) where
91    fill f = H.ix f [H.b1]
92
